name: A Structure of Unknown Origin at Little Pine State Park
name_original: A Structure of Unknown Origin at Little Pine State Park
description:
A park ranger at Little Pine State Park in Pennsylvania investigates a strange shape on the horizon -- a structure of some sort that has appeared suddenly in a forest clearing with no warning and no sign of construction.

Made for the Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend Jam

E to interact

F to toggle flashlight

G to drop glowstick (hold to throw)

There is no end to this game. Play until you are ready to stop.
